abstract: Stocks drop sharply as investors fret over possible interest rate hikes and weaker oil demand.
lead_paragraph: Oil prices fell after a leading industry group said global oil demand growth was slowing more than previously thought.
snippet: Oil prices fell after a leading industry group said global oil demand growth was slowing more than previously thought....

headline.main: Market Falls After Forecast of Weaker Demand for Oil
headline.print_headline: Market Falls After a Forecast of Weaker Demand for Oil
